EmailTemplate.name: 11-22-22 BNK Connect Mag V2 Issue 3 NAMER resend.BNK Connect Mag V2I3 NAMER rese
EmailTemplate.subject: CONNECT! Read all the latest trends happening in banking
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We’re excited to share our latest issue of CONNECT, bringing you the current trends shaping and transforming the global banking industry. Discover more about: - Open banking and whether it compromises customer data - How AI can extend support beyond the call center - Why you should be modernizing outdated teller systems - What banking can learn from the retail approach to the metaverse CONNECT shares trends impacting your financial institution – and ways to adapt. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Catch up <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/connect-magazine-q3-2022/thank-you?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_Oct_CONNECTMagazine_Banking &utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=banking&utm_sub-industry=]]> on past issues of CONNECT. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
